Tariffs impacting world of high-end stereo equipment
Description
17 minutes ago
A Nova Scotia small business owner says tensions with the United States are causing him more major headaches because his customers are refusing to buy American products. The audio video equipment expert says his whole supply chain is pivoting away from the U.S. Ariel MacKenzie takes a look at how the trade way is impacting the world of high-end stereo equipment.
